LanguageData.JDG_BeginUmbralStrideDesc: Cloak oneself in shadow to become completely invisible for a time, or until leaving the Dark God's shadows.
LanguageData.JDG_CannotUmbralStrideNotInDarkness: Cannot begin umbral striding while outside conjured darkness - it would immediately end.
LanguageData.JDG_EndUmbralStrideDesc: Cast off the cloak of shadows and immediately reveal oneself.
LanguageData.JDG_CreateUmbralCloneDesc: Use favor to clone a rare item, an animal, or a mechanoid. The cost depends on the target.
LanguageData.JDG_StopConcentrationDesc: Some abilities, such as conjure darkness, remain until cancelled
